meanings.meaning: the passing of the old year

vlive.korean: [500년 묵은 은행나무보다 더 단단하다] 잘할 수 있을 것 같아, 너희들... [My abdominal breathing is so powerful] I think you can do well. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [3년 전 오늘의 KIM DONG WAN] 낭랑하고 듣기 좋은 목소리를 가진 역대급 홍보대사 ✨김동완✨ (Dongwan’s V 3years ago)
vlive.english: [My abdominal breathing is so powerful] I think you can do well.

vlive.korean: 너는 새해 소망이 묵은 김치를 먹는 거예요? Your wish for the new year is to eat old kimchi? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [우주소녀] 해피뉴이어 우정 🥰
vlive.english: Your wish for the new year is to eat old kimchi?

vlive.korean: 효소는 쉽게 말해서 묵은 때를 빼는 관리에요. In simple terms, enzyme care is removing dead skin cells. 듣기 View video 뷰티로그(beautylog) : [뷰티로그 5회]나르샤의 7단계 기초 케어 & 중력을 거스르는 탄력관리!
vlive.english: In simple terms, enzyme care is removing dead skin cells.

vlive.korean: [오래 묵은 노폐물 사운드. mp4] 이게 다 피부에 있는 노폐물들이 나왔다는 소리에요. This sound means that all of the residue came out of the skin. 듣기 View video 뷰티로그(beautylog) : [뷰티로그 16회]그루밍 男 원대의 모닝 케어 공개!
vlive.english: This sound means that all of the residue came out of the skin.

vlive.korean: [톡톡 톡톡] [얼굴에 묵은 노폐물 잡는 중. mov] 안에 있는 노폐물들을 다 녹여주고 죽여버리는 팩이랍니다. This pack melts and destroys all of the residue. 듣기 View video 뷰티로그(beautylog) : [뷰티로그 16회]그루밍 男 원대의 모닝 케어 공개!
vlive.english: This pack melts and destroys all of the residue.

examples.korean: ‘Who would do such a thing?’ ‘Maybe someone with an old score to settle.’ 발음듣기 “누가 그런 짓을 할까?” “아마 갚아야 할 묵은 원한이 있는 누구겠지.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Who would do such a thing?’ ‘Maybe someone with an old score to settle.’ 발음

examples.korean: the passing of the old year 발음듣기 묵은해가 지나감 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the passing of the old year 발음

examples.korean: The hotel we stayed in was really dilapidated. 발음듣기 우리가 묵은 호텔은 정말로 허름한 곳이었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hotel we stayed in was really dilapidated. 발음

examples.korean: He apologized for opening up old wounds during conversation. 발음듣기 대화 중 묵은 상처를 건드려서 그는 미안하다고 했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He apologized for opening up old wounds during conversation. 발음

examples.korean: I feel like a huge weight had been lifted off my shoulder. I feel as free as a bird. 발음듣기 십 년 묵은 체증이 다 내려가는 기분이다 Neungyule
examples.english: I feel like a huge weight had been lifted off my shoulder. I feel as free as a bird. 발음
